show_name: Detective Conan: Full Score of Fear (movie 12)
other_title: Detective Conan: La musica della paura (Italian)
Detektiv Conan: Die Partitur des Grauens (German)
Meitantei Conan: Senritsu no Full Score (Japanese)
المحقق كونان: لحن كامل من الرعب (Arabic)
名偵探柯南 戰慄的樂譜 (Chinese (Taiwan))
名探偵コナン 戦慄の楽譜（フルスコア） (Japanese)
plot: Serial murders involving all kinds have happened. All the victims are from a Music School led by a famous pianist. Conan and company have been invited to a opening concert of the Music Hall built by the pianist. The biggest attraction of this concert is the world famous violin called "Stradivarius" and a special appearance of a singer who has perfect pitch.
ending_theme: "Tsubasa o Hirogete (翼を広げて)" by ZARD
